summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) Daily Activity Report and Lieutenant's Log for August 10-11, 2019, documenting the shift during which inmate Jeffrey Epstein was found unresponsive in his cell and transported to an outside hospital. The log details routine prison operations, counts, and the medical emergency response.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Inmate #76318-054, found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on the morning of August 10, 2019. CPR was performed, and he was transported to a local hospital.

persons.name: Lt. Anderson
persons.context: The lieutenant who was relieved of duty at approximately 5:30 AM on August 10, 2019, just prior to the discovery of Epstein's medical emergency.

persons.name: Fernandez
persons.context: Inmate #486824-054, noted as being in a dry cell in the SHU at 12:35 AM on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Mutimura
persons.context: Inmate #76329-054, transferred to a special housing dry cell on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Carreon-Macias
persons.context: Inmate #482858-198, noted as being relieved via bail bond on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Imo Nyanza
persons.context: An inmate listed in the administrative detention section of the log for August 10, 2019.

connections.description: Lt. Anderson was the operations lieutenant on duty just before Epstein was found unresponsive.

events.title: Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: At 6:33 AM, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) in the Special Housing Unit. CPR was initiated, 911 was called at 6:35 AM, EMS arrived at 6:43 AM, and Epstein was transported to a local hospital at 7:10 AM with CPR still in progress.

events.title: Shift Change and Counts
events.description: Routine prison operations including shift changes, multiple institutional counts, equipment checks, and the noting of a malfunctioning Control Center Fire Panel.

events.title: Inmate Transfers and Release
events.description: Inmate Mutimura was transferred to a special housing dry cell, and inmate Carreon-Macias was released on a bail bond.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) in the Special Housing Unit at 6:33 AM on August 10, 2019.
CPR was performed on Epstein by prison staff and continued by EMTs. He was transported to a local hospital via ambulance at 7:10 AM.
The prison log indicates Epstein was on 'Suicide Watch' with an inmate companion prior to the incident.
The Control Center Fire Panel was reported as inoperative during the shift.
The document is a detailed, chronological log of prison operations surrounding the time of Epstein's death, showing routine counts and security procedures.
